p: Artemisia jordanica Danin (AJ); is a perennial aromatic herbaceous shrubby plant that belongs to the Compositae family with succulent, narrow, and simple leaves. Its native range is South Palestine to Iraq. The leaves decoction of (AJ) plant is utilized in traditional Bedouin medicine as an antihypertensive, antispasmodic, and anthelmintic medicine [ 21].
